projects.title: Relax
projects.description: A soothing, retro-inspired poster washed in vintage cyan tones. A figure floats weightlessly through a texture of clouds and water, embodying a sense of 1970s nostalgia and the quiet, effortless state of simply existing.

projects.title: Primordial
projects.description: 'Love Is Sacrifice' captures the primal, consuming nature of ultimate devotion. The fiery, red nebula symbolizes the intense, painful passion of commitment. This piece is a cosmic metaphor for the truth that genuine love requires the profound, beautiful, and energetic abandonment of the self.

projects.title: Respect
projects.description: Respect is not a given, it is a hard-won reward. The image demands that we recognize and honor true merit. The phrase 'HATS OFF WHEN RESPECT IS EARNED' is a universal call to value substance over superficiality, celebrating only those achievements that are genuinely earned.

projects.title: Bloom
projects.description: This artwork signifies that true selfhood, once fully realized and nurtured, manifests as something utterly beautiful, abundant, and naturally luminous. The floral head represents the internal transformation: when you allow yourself to 'bloom,' your inner complexity and vitality become your most striking and visible feature.

projects.title: Zero
projects.description: Zero is the circle of eternity, where endings and beginnings blur into one. Is not absence, but the point of perfect equilibriumâ€”the origin from which all possibilities emerge and the endpoint to which they return.
